channel.title: Hello Stu
channel.description: A podcast of audio notes, shared openly for those that want to hear them. This podcast will likely touch on topics such as my health & fitness activites, design, photography, film, music, society and everything else in between.
channel.itunes:author: Stuart Mackenzie
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast of audio notes, shared openly for those that want to hear them. This podcast will likely touch on topics such as my health & fitness activites, design, photography, film, music, society and everything else in between.

item.title: Zen Friday
item.description: A random update recorded whilst hiking around Maiden Castle. I briefly cover work, friends, fitness and 100 parkruns!
item.itunes:title: Zen Friday
